Digital Summit 2020 Sponsors

Sponsors

Thankyou to our key event sponsors for their support in making the Digital Summit 2020 event a success.

We invite you to visit our sponsors' and exhibitors' virtual booths during the exhibition hours during the Digital Summit.

Virtual exhibition times

The virtual exhibition is from 10:00 am to 11:00 am, and from 12:00 pm to 1:00 pm on each day of the Digital Summit.

We will continue to add sponsors and exhibitors.

Buy tickets
Get updates

Platinum sponsors

Microsoft

Established in 1985, Microsoft Australia is subsidiary of Microsoft Corp. Microsoft is the world leader in software, services, devices, and solutions that empower every person and every organisation on the planet to achieve more. Microsoft enables digital transformation for the era of an intelligent cloud and an intelligent edge. Headquartered in Sydney, Microsoft Australia has 7 regional offices across the country employing over 1,000 people. Woven throughout daily life, work or play, Microsoft technologies enable millions of Australian partners and customers to innovate in new ways. Our platforms harmonise the interests of our customers, developers, and IT better than any competing ecosystem or platform. Microsoft is driven to help anyone make the most of any moment – to help create a world where people can make the most of their time and to lead more fulfilling lives.

Rimini Street

Rimini Street is a global provider of enterprise software products and services. It is the leading third-party support provider for Oracle and SAP software products and a Salesforce partner. Rimini Street offers premium, ultra-responsive and integrated application management and support services. These services enable enterprise software licensees to save significant costs, free up resources for innovation and achieve better business outcomes. Over 2,100 Fortune 500, Fortune Global 100, midmarket, public sector, and other organisations from a broad range of industries rely on Rimini Street as their trusted application enterprise software products and services provider.

Gold sponsors

Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialised skills across more than 40 industries, Accenture offers strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations services – all powered by the world’s largest network of advanced technology and intelligent operations centers.

Dragonfly Technologies

Dragonfly brings cybersecurity, enterprise networking and cutting-edge automation together to fill the digital capabilities gap. Dragonfly have shaped the technology of some of Australia's largest organisations and is the partner of choice of Australia's most security conscious organisations. Telstra has chosen Dragonfly as their networking and security automation partner.

GitLab

GitLab is a platform for the whole DevOps lifecycle. GitLab is the world's largest remote company, with over 1,300 team members in 68 countries and regions. GitLab works with thousands of developers and millions of users to deliver new innovations. Over 100,000 organizations trust GitLab to deliver great software, faster.

PwC Australia

PwC brings solutions to help deliver services – from digital strategy and innovation to enterprise architecture, and technology change from delivery through to testing and quality management to make our businesses thrive. PwC has over 12,000 technologists globally with over 670 in Australia providing a expertise, knowledge, and experience.

SAP Australia

SAP is a leading provider of enterprise solutions to government and non-profit agencies worldwide. SAP is committed to helping governments protect communities, serve constituents, and drive economic prosperity. With SAP's enterprise solutions, public sector agencies can automate processes, boost performance, decide with data, and empower employees with ease and intelligence.

The DTA does not endorse the listed Sponsors and/or Exhibitors product, service or organisation at the Digital Summit 2020. Approval and acceptance of sponsorship/exhibition opportunities does not indicate that Sponsors and/or Exhibitors will be provided opportunities to work with the DTA or government in the future.
